UniprotID	Q9H1E3
Accession	Q9H1E3;Q54AC0;Q5PXE7;Q9H1D6;Q9H723
EntryName	NUCKS_HUMAN
ProteinName	Nuclear ubiquitous casein and cyclin-dependent kinase substrate 1 (P1)
GeneName	NUCKS1 NUCKS JC7
Length	243
Function	Chromatin-associated protein involved in DNA repair by promoting homologous recombination (HR) (PubMed:26323318). Binds double-stranded DNA (dsDNA) and secondary DNA structures, such as D-loop structures, but with less affinity than RAD51AP1 (PubMed:26323318).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus; Chromosome
